title: BBQ On The Lawn 4 - (BOTL)
description: Our Final event of the year, BBQ on The Lawn. Open entry for everyone so bring your friends for the free food, cheap drinks and good vibes.

title: Annual General Meeting 2025
description: It is time to elect the next years Committee! Members can come to our Annual General Meeting to hear how the club went this year, seeing if we made or lost money. Then election for executive positions are opened and voted on to decide the 2026 Executive Team!

title: Ignite Ball (Jazz Club)
description:
Thats right our annual Ignite Ball is back!
This year we are bringing you all the spectacular glitz, glam and suave jazz club vibes. Thats right, this years theme is jazz club so grab your mates, your dancing shoes and strap in for the night of all nights.

title: Civmec Site Tour
description: Join the Curtin Engineers Club for an exclusive site tour of Civmec’s world-class facilities in Henderson on Wednesday, September 3rd. This is a rare opportunity to go behind the scenes of one of Australia’s top engineering and construction companies, operating across infrastructure, marine, and defence sectors.

title: Prok Site Tour
description:
Join us for an exclusive behind-the-scenes site tour of PROK, a leading manufacturer of conveyor components and solutions!
This is your chance to gain industry insight, network with professionals, and see real-world engineering in action. Whether you’re interested in mechanical design or manufacturing.

title: Pubcrawl 2
description: Our Most popular event of the year, Pubcrawl is back for semester 2! This time be sure to embrace your inner gamer and dress in the Nintendo Theme. See you out there Mario!

title: Ready Steady Build
description:
Are you ready to test your ingenuity, flex your creativity, and represent your club in the first technical showdown of the year?
Curtin Engineers Club (CEC) and Curtin Robotics Club (CRoC) are teaming up for the first time ever to bring you “Ready, Steady, Build!”

title: BBQ On The Lawn 3 - (BOTL)
description:
Join us for our third BBQ on the Lawn this year, in front of the Engineering Pavillion (215)
Free Sangs, Beer, Cider, 50c Soft Drinks!

title: PiP Workshop: Values & Consulting in Practice
description: Join us for an insightful workshop hosted by PiP, where you’ll dive into the real-world application of consulting practices grounded in strong core values. Learn directly from industry professionals as they share consulting methodologies, discuss PiP's values, and explore the opportunities available within their company.

title: O-Day Semester 2
description: We are excited to see everyone back and refreshed. Come down to join the club, learn about evetns and meet the team. We cant wait to kick this semester off strong!

title: Quiz Night
description: The Curtin Engineers Club Annual Quiz Night is here! Test your knowledge, and witt, with trivia, drinks and pizza! Quiz night features general knowledge topics so anyone is welcome to attend.

title: Sundowner Grad Night
description: Join the Curtin Engineers Club for a relaxed and engaging evening of networking! Whether you're looking to connect with industry professionals, explore graduate and intern opportunities, or simply expand your network, this event is the perfect chance to do so—all while enjoying great food, drinks, and company.

title: BBQ On The Lawn 2 - (BOTL)
description: Brace the cold and come out for our second BBQ on The Lawn of 2025. Enjoy a break from study with snags, cheap drinks you know and love. Only $5 entry for non-members so bring your friends!

title: Pubcrawl 1
description: Climb aboard this ship and draw your cutlesses as our Pirate Pubcrawl is here! Starting at Varsity and sailing through Perth be ready for rough waters and hold onto your hat!

title: Resume Workshop
description: Gain 6 EPEP logbook pres hours and learn from Professionals at Engineers Australia to ready yourself with the skills you need for networking, job-seeking, and succeeding in the Engineering World!

title: Engineer Your Career
description:
Have you found a vacation or graduate work yet? Come network with our attending companies to make your introduction into industry!
Get a supportive environment to network, gain connections for vacation/grad work and learn about different engineering companies

title: BBQ On The Lawn 1 - (BOTL)
description: Join us on the grass outside BLD 215 for free snags, games, and drinks! 18+ Event with free snags, 50c Soft Drinks, Beers, Ciders, Premix Cans and Free Entry for members

title: O-Day Semester 1
description: The new year is here! Come down to our stall at O-day and meet the new committee, learn what events are happening and become a member. Be quick before all the free merch gets swooped up!
